isis.stitle: TSI 92-08-08 - Introduction of New Instrument Cluster

geninfo.para: Navistar introduced a new instrument cluster for 1000, 2000, 3000, 4000 and 8000 Model vehicles. The cluster went into production in March of this year. The new cluster is in response to customer input and provides a number of advantages including:
For further product information refer to CT-400 Sales Data Book, PL-282-284 Price List and General Information update G-1272.

Service Parts has issued a Parts Information Letter PIL-92-08-01, which gives part numbers and codes covering the retrofitting of the new instrument cluster into vehicles that were built prior to April 3, 1992. The PIL also gives old cluster to new cluster conversion numbers.

For service information refer to CTS-5088 in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual. CTS-5088 gives a general description of the instrument cluster, removal and installation procedure, instructions on how to calculate different dip switch settings for both the Speedometer and Tachometer, Speedometer and Tachometer sensor information and complete cluster failure diagnostics.
Circuit Diagram manuals will be available July, 1992.
